name: Cricket Clash
description:
Battle it out with Cricket fans from around the World in this realtime multiplayer Cricket game. Bat and Bowl your way to victory by smashing the ball for six and strategising with your bowl choice.

Upgrade your kit as to progress and take on other people to decide who really has the best Cricket playing skills.

MULTIPLAYER
Cricket Clash is a head to head multiplayer Cricket battle, where both Batting and Bowling will decide who comes out on top!

WORLDWIDE COMPETITION
Face off against other real people, around the world, in a quest to become the best Cricketer the world has ever seen.

HUGE PRIZES
Unlock bigger prizes and new Cricket arenas by beating your opponents and collecting their cash in locations such as India, Australia and England!

BIG HITS AND SPIN BREAKS
Smash big hits past the boundaries! Fool your opponent with crafty spin bowls or crush them with pace! Position your fielders for optimal coverage!

COLLECT 'EM ALL
Collecting and upgrading a huge range of bats, each with unique strengths, will give you the power to bash your opponents between the wickets!

Important
This game is free to play but does includes optional in-app purchases that may be bought with real money.
